markdownRemark.html:
In the spirit of reflection on the year passed. (This post has been backdated and added after the fact.)

I made my first (tiny) commit to open source - particularly, the site Howtographql. It really is not anything to shout about, but I felt it was worth mentioning. A journey of a thousand steps start with the smallest step! (Even if that step was 8 moths ago!) :O
